title: Pantheon just too good for unskilled player!
body:
Hi there i wanna open a threat about my most beloved and hated champ in LoL!
Pantheon has a Point-Click Stunn, Cone-Dmg ability with crit passive and what really grinds my gears a point Click damage ability you cant dodge.
What do you think about changing his Q to a skillshot with range indicator like nidalee spear!?
Am I the only one that bothers this at all?

best regards!

replies.body:
Hey Darling, 
I think ur not higher ranked than bronze, and this is the german forum by the way. Anyway i suggest a player like you to cry more that he is op and you should play teemo dude. TEEMO IS OP!!!:D
ironie OFF:D
